sentences.sContent: Now the word "continence" there is just referring to asceticism, but in this text it doesn't mean just controlling your sex life, it means not having sex entirely.
sentences.sContent_eng: Now the word "continence" there is just referring to asceticism, but in this text it doesn't mean just controlling your sex life, it means not having sex entirely.
sentences.sCn: 这里的“自制“指禁欲主义，但在文章中不仅仅代表控制性生活，而是彻底避开性事。

synos.tran: 自制，克制；节欲（尤指禁欲）

trans.tranCn: 自制, 克制, 节欲(尤指禁欲)
trans.tranOther: the ability to control your sexual desires
